name: Baila Calavera
description:
This is our Global game Jam Project. Game for 4 players (two in each team)

This is a cooperative party game.

You are two in a team : 

- One is the finder and have the capacity to find where are the golden maracas

- One is the digger and digg where is TeamMate tell him to dig

Team :

Developer : Arthur Tavernini and Julien Payssan

Art : Thomas Boyer and Vincent Hoffman

Game design : Charly Lecoq and Alexandre Caille

Sound Design : Florian Lagarde
